import React,{useState} from 'react' import { Link,useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import AxiosRequest from '../../axios'; const Signup = () => { const initialRegistrationDetails = Object.freeze({username:"",name:"",email:"",password:"",confirm_password:""}) const [register,setRegister] = useState(initialRegistrationDetails); const handleClear = () => { setRegister(); } const handleSubmit = () => { console.log(register); AxiosRequest.post(`posts/add`,{email:register.email}) } const handleChange = (e) => { const feedRegisterForm = {...register, [e.target.name]:e.target.value} setRegister(feedRegisterForm) } return (
